## Problem 2
```{r}
n = 30
sd = 5
mu = 0

sim_t_test = function(n = 30, mu, sd = 5, num_sim) {
  sim_data = expand_grid(
    iter = 1:num_sim,
    sample_size = n
  ) |> 
    mutate(
      x_df = map(sample_size, \(x) tibble(rnorm(x, mu, sd))), 
      t_test = map(x_df, \(x) broom::tidy(t.test(x)))
    ) |> 
    unnest(t_test)
  
  return(sim_data)
}

sim_5000 = sim_t_test(n = 30, mu = 0, sd = 5, num_sim = 5000)
```
